body_html: @Garoe, what version of Visual Studio and what MSBuild target have you used in your initial build? I keep getting "compiler is out of heap space" error when I compile ALL_BUILD.vcxproj or tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj target with CUDA support.
